name: Organ Pipes Escapade
description:
Suffragettes in Bristol hid in the organ pipes of the Colston Hall the night before a political meeting that women were not allowed to attend. When the speaker started they disrupted it shouting Votes For Women from their hiding place.  It took a while for the stewards to find and eject them.

Here is a game where you help them to succeed in their plan!

Designed by Lexi at a Grrrl Games workshop for Deeds Not Words, a Bristol Women's Voice project
